title: Organic Pesticides | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Responding to pesticide inquiries at the Extension office.
subtasks: Answering questions about organic pesticide options.
Advising on the availability and certification of organic pesticides.
Emphasizing the importance of personal protective equipment (PPE) when using pesticides.
Cautioning against the toxicity of pesticides to beneficial insects.
Reminding to read the pesticide label.
Highlighting the necessity of proper product usage despite being organic.
Acknowledging limited availability of organic options for all pests.
Encouraging creative alternative control measures when necessary.
Identifying Caleb Carter as the speaker.
Acknowledging affiliation with the University of Wyoming Extension.
End message for "From the Ground Up" series.
